data.name: Nukalypse Zombie Survival
data.detailed_description: "Nukalypse Zombie Survival" is a parody of the "Call Of Duty : Zombies" franchise,requiring less power out of a PC. Endless rounds of zombies are coming at you,getting stronger withh each round and in increasing numbers. Choose your favorite weapon,weather it be a pistol,shotgun,sniper rifle,or just a plain old machine gun. Discover the ruins of the now infected mental hospital where it all began as you and your team of allies must find a way out and try to find a cure and kill the man who started it all...
data.about_the_game: "Nukalypse Zombie Survival" is a parody of the "Call Of Duty : Zombies" franchise,requiring less power out of a PC. Endless rounds of zombies are coming at you,getting stronger withh each round and in increasing numbers. Choose your favorite weapon,weather it be a pistol,shotgun,sniper rifle,or just a plain old machine gun. Discover the ruins of the now infected mental hospital where it all began as you and your team of allies must find a way out and try to find a cure and kill the man who started it all...
data.short_description: Fight off the horde of zombies coming your way with any means necessary! The rounds are endless,and the zombies keep on coming...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible

content_descriptors.notes: Mild Violence and Animated Blood,Mild Cursing and Language
